name: Temple of the Silver Dragon
description:
You have five minutes on the clock. How much treasure can you collect and escape with before time runs out.

Currently in closed beta access that is why the prce is set so high, expect bugs.

Features:

  • 17 Unique rooms to explore
  • An online highscores leaderboard 
  • Currently in active development

View Highscores: https://airtable.com/shr2so5CMrcL7E4OZ/tbljiyB4zFkGcjATP

Enjoy!
